Bash(git commit -m "fix: update textbook overview button to link to correct content

- Changed Textbook Overview button from tutorial link to /introduction
- Changed Explore Content button to link to /docs/humanoid-robotics-basics
- Both buttons now properly link to textbook content instead of Docusaurus tutorials")

Bash(git commit -m "fix: remove /docs/ prefix from all internal links

- Updated all module card links to use root paths instead of /docs/ prefixed paths
- Fixed ''Explore Content'' button to use correct path without /docs/ prefix
- Updated footer ''Textbook Overview'' link to point to /introduction instead of tutorial

This ensures all links follow the correct format:
https://book-humanoid-robotics-hackathon-ts.vercel.app/[page-name]
instead of the incorrect:
https://book-humanoid-robotics-hackathon-ts.vercel.app/docs/[page-name]")

Bash(git commit -m "feat: implement RAG chatbot for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook

- Connect frontend ChatbotWidget to backend RAG API
- Enable semantic search and retrieval from textbook content
- Add personalization based on user preferences
- Implement environment-aware API endpoint configuration
- Integrate chatbot widget into main website layout
- Support for selected text queries and proper citations

The RAG chatbot is now fully functional, allowing users to ask questions about the textbook content and receive AI-generated responses based on the actual textbook material.")

Bash(git commit -m "feat: add sidebar chat option for textbook assistant

- Create SidebarChat component with slide-out functionality
- Add SidebarChatToggle button positioned on left side of screen
- Connect sidebar chat to existing RAG API backend
- Style components to match website theme
- Integrate sidebar chat into main website layout
- Provide users with alternative UI option to floating chat widget

Users can now choose between the floating chat widget or the sidebar chat
for interacting with the AI textbook assistant.")

Bash(git commit -m "fix: correct import path for SidebarChat component

- Update import path from ''./SidebarChat'' to ''./SidebarChat/SidebarChat''
- This fixes the module resolution error during Vercel build")

Bash(git commit -m "fix: correct AuthContext import path in SidebarChat component

- Update import path from ''../contexts/AuthContext'' to ''../../contexts/AuthContext''
- This fixes the module resolution error during Vercel build")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix introduction page accessibility and update gitignore

- Remove slug: / from introduction.md to make it accessible at /introduction
